attributes.action: The UK Secondary Canteen Prices lower to more affordable prices in the UK
attributes.additional_details: So more children can afford school meals and not stay hungry due to high inflation of prices for school meals and food
attributes.background: The UK secondary canteen food is very expensive and it is not affordable, my request is to make the prices lower and more cost effective for all the students in Secondary

rejection.details:
The prices charged for food in schools are a matter for schools and any private catering providers they work with, not the UK Government or House of Commons.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

Increase funding for school meals so schools can invest in healthier foods: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610990

Fund free school meals for all students year-round: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600474

Fund an increase to the school meal allowance in line with inflation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605502
